definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Her hat was tricked out with a yellow ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 她的帽子饰以黄色缎带。

sentences.english: I went and bought some of this sweet ass red from my suppliers out in Sydney's Industrial area.
sentences.chinese: 我去买了些这种甜甜的粉红色缎带。

sentences.english: They were several inches high and had embroidered leather, silk or velvet straps.
sentences.chinese: 这种鞋有几寸高，用皮革，丝绸或天鹅绒缎带装饰。

sentences.english: The main spiral staircase depicts a rhythmic ribbon that ascends to attic space.
sentences.chinese: 主旋转楼梯像一条螺旋上升的缎带将空间引向顶楼。

sentences.english: She wears a ribbon belt round her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她在腰部束了一条缎带。

sentences.english: This function can only be unlocked when a Pokémon gains a ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 只有当一个精灵获得一个缎带后这项功能才会解锁。

sentences.english: Who laced and filleted the earth so fine with rivers like green ribbons smaragdine?
sentences.chinese: 谁用翠玉缎带般的河川把地球编织得这样好看？

sentences.english: She wore ribbons in her black hair and clung to her dreams.
sentences.chinese: 她在黑头发上系着红缎带，恋恋不舍自己的梦。

sentences.english: This is a photograph of a tartan ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 这是一张格子缎带的照片。

sentences.english: If the ribbons be not fastened, do not mind.
sentences.chinese: 如果缎带没被拴紧，不要介意。

sentences.english: We want to buy Ribbons and Laces, A Variety of Ribbons With Affordable Price.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购缎带和饰带，用可负担的价格多种缎带。

sentences.english: We want to buy Ribbons and Laces, A Variety of Ribbons With Affordable Price.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购缎带和饰带，用可负担的价格多种缎带。
